alert.note: Alert for La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:02PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Otero and southeastern Pueblo Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 302 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Fowler, or 27 miles west of La Junta, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rocky Ford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.

area.areaDesc: La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
